properties.name: CASEOH: DONT GET EATEN
properties.description:
UH OH!!!
Caseoh wants to buy waffle house but you got there first, he challenged you to a battle. who will win?
properties.author: toppat inc

events.comment: Go to level0 when StartButton is clicked
Mute Music
Language
The player or the enemy play first at random
Make the window bigger on computers
Initialize health bars
Information
Go back to the start menu

In this state, the player will choose between 2 attacks.

Transition to another state:
 - "PlayerAttack" when an attack is chosen
 
Transitions from another state:
- "Beginning" if the player is the 1st to play
- "EnemyAttack" when enemy turn ends

In this state, a given attack animation is played and damage are done.

Transition to another state:
 - "EnemyChoice" when the attack ends
 - "GameOver" if the enemy dies
 
Transitions from another state:
- "PlayerChoice" when an attack is chosen
The variable "BeenDamaged" allows to do some actions only when a damage is done.
Launch a fire ball toward the enemy
Invoke a zombie to attack the enemy
Update the health bar
Transition to "GameOver"
Make a flash effect on the enemy

In this state, the enemy will choose between 2 attacks.

Transition to another state:
 - "EnemyAttack" when an attack is chosen

Transitions from another state:
- "Beginning" if the enemy is the 1st to play
- "PlayerAttack" when player turn ends
Mark a pause before choosing an attack
70% fire balls
30% zombies

In this state, a given attack animation is played and damage are done.

Transition to another state:
 - "PlayerChoice" when the attack ends
 - "GameOver" if the player dies
 
Transitions from another state:
- "EnemyChoice" when an attack is chosen
The variable "BeenDamaged" allows to do some actions only when a damage is done.
Launch a fire ball toward the player
Invoke a zombie to attack the player
Update the health bar
Transition to "GameOver"
Make a flash effect on the enemy

In this state, a given attack animation is played and damage are done.

Transition to another state:
 - "Beginning" when restart button is pressed
 
Transitions from another state:
 - "PlayerAttack" when the enemy dies
 - "EnemeyAttack" when the player dies
Players are deleted when they die. So, the winner is the remaining one.
Transition to "Beginning" by relaunching the scene

eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: PanelSpriteButton
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: A button that can be customized.
description: The button can be customized with a background for each state and a label. It handles user interactions and a simple condition can be used to check if it is clicked.
There are ready-to-use buttons in the asset-store [menu buttons pack](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?initial-dialog=asset-store&asset-pack=menu-buttons-menu-buttons).

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: The finite state machine used internally by the button object.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: ButtonFSM

events.comment: The "Validated" state only last one frame.
Make sure the cursor position is only checked once per frame.
Touches are always pressed, so ShouldCheckHovering doesn't matter.

eventsFunctions.description: Reset the state of the button.
eventsFunctions.name: ResetState

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the button is not used.
eventsFunctions.name: IsIdle

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the button was just clicked.
eventsFunctions.name: IsClicked

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the cursor is hovered over the button.
eventsFunctions.name: IsHovered

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the button is either hovered or pressed but not hovered.
eventsFunctions.name: IsFocused

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the button is currently being pressed with mouse or touch.
eventsFunctions.name: IsPressed

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the button is currently being pressed outside with mouse or touch.
eventsFunctions.name: IsPressedOutside

eventsFunctions.description: the touch id that is using the button or 0 if none.
eventsFunctions.name: TouchId

eventsBasedObjects.description: A button that can be customized.
eventsBasedObjects.name: PanelSpriteButton

events.comment:
Create one background instance for of each state.
Only the instance for the current state is shown.
Place the label over the backgrounds.
Show the right background accordingly to the new state.

Children instances must be resized when the button size change:
- backgrounds for each state are resized to take the full dimensions of the button
- the label is put back at the center of the button

The scale is set back to 1 because it means that the parent instance has the same dimensions as the union of its children instances.

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the button is not used.

eventsFunctions.name: IsPressed

eventsFunctions.description: Change the text of the button label.
eventsFunctions.name: SetLabelText

eventsFunctions.description: Return the label text.
eventsFunctions.name: LabelText

eventsFunctions.description: Return the label center Y according to the button configuration. This expression is used in doStepPostEvents when the button is pressed or released.
eventsFunctions.name: CenterWithPaddingY

eventsFunctions.description: Center the label according to the button configuration. This is used in doStepPostEvents when the button is resized.
eventsFunctions.name: CenterLabel

eventsFunctions.description: De/activate interactions with the button.
eventsFunctions.name: Activate

eventsFunctions.description: Check if interactions are activated on the button.
eventsFunctions.name: IsActivated

propertyDescriptors.label: Label offset on Y axis when pressed
propertyDescriptors.name: PressedLabelOffsetY

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: Bouh
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: Gamepads
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Add support for gamepads (or other controllers) to your game, giving access to information such as button presses, axis positions, trigger pressure, etc...
description: Add support for gamepads (or other controllers).
- automatic mappers for platformer characters and top-down movement
The Bomberman-like example handles 4 players with gamepads ([open the project online](https://editor.gdevelop.io/?project=example://goose-bomberman)).

eventsFunctions.description: Get the value of the pressure on a gamepad trigger.

eventsFunctions.description:
Get the rotation value of a gamepad stick.
If the deadzone value is high, the angle value is rounded to main axes, left, left, up, down.
An zero deadzone value give a total freedom on the angle value.
eventsFunctions.name: StickRotationValue

eventsFunctions.description:
Return the angle of a gamepad stick.
If the deadzone value is high, the angle value is rounded to main axes, left, left, up, down.
An zero deadzone value give a total freedom on the angle value.

eventsFunctions.description:
Test if a button is released on a gamepad. Buttons can be:
* Xbox: "A", "B", "X", "Y", "LB", "RB", "LT", "RT", "BACK", "START",
* PS4: "CROSS", "SQUARE", "CIRCLE", "TRIANGLE", "L1", "L2", "R1", "R2", "SHARE", "OPTIONS", "PS_BUTTON", "CLICK_TOUCHPAD",
* Other: "UP", "DOWN", "LEFT", "RIGHT", "CLICK_STICK_LEFT", "CLICK_STICK_RIGHT".

eventsFunctions.description:
Return the last button pressed. 
Buttons for Xbox and PS4 can be:
* Xbox: "A", "B", "X", "Y", "LB", "RB", "LT", "RT", "BACK", "START",
* PS4: "CROSS", "SQUARE", "CIRCLE", "TRIANGLE", "L1", "L2", "R1", "R2", "SHARE", "OPTIONS", "PS_BUTTON", "CLICK_TOUCHPAD",
* Both: "UP", "DOWN", "LEFT", "RIGHT", "CLICK_STICK_LEFT", "CLICK_STICK_RIGHT".

eventsFunctions.description: Set the deadzone for sticks of the gamepad. The deadzone is an area for which movement on sticks won't be taken into account (instead, the stick will be considered as not moved). Deadzone is between 0 and 1, and is by default 0.2.
eventsFunctions.name: A_Set_deadzone
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set deadzone for sticks on gamepad: _PARAM1_ to _PARAM2_

inlineCode: console.error('Parameter gamepad identifier in action: "Set gamepad deadzone for sticks", is not valid, must be between 0 and 4.');

parameters.description: Deadzone for sticks, 0.2 by default (0 to 1)
parameters.name: deadzone
